features: 🌟EXCELLENT CLASSROOM PRIZES -- Arscniek 3D animal erasers, made of non-toxic & latex-free rubber materials, safe for little child. Cute food mini erasers, erase pencil mark easily, bring an entertaining way to put mistakes away. Great student motivators, best prizes for kids classroom & good behavior reward, improve children's learning interest!

🎈FUNNY EDUCATIONAL TOYS -- Pencil erasers for kids with realistic appearances and bright random colors, develop children's color & shape cognition, inspire imagination & creativity. Tiny puzzle erasers can be taken apart and reassembled again and again, very interesting! Also improve logical thinking ability, fine motor skill, hand-eye coordination.

🎉FIT FOR VARIOUS OCCASIONS -- Each kids eraser is individually package, about 1-2'', perfect for desk pets, party favors, Easter egg fillers, stocking stuffers, goodie bags, advent calendar, treasure box, trick-or-treaters, classroom rewards, game prizes and more. Also ideal as parent-child game essentials & bedtime story supplies, enjoy joy family time!

💖VARIETY ERASERS COLLECTION -- A huge number of take apart erasers(no duplicate) can be divided into different series: Animal, Transportation, Desserts, Vegetables & Fruit. Like Panda, kangaroo, tiger, ships, cars, cupcake, pizza, carrot, lemon, rocket, alien, etc. So many kinds of erasers are nice choice for erasers collectors, a huge hits with kids!

🎁BEST GIFT FOR KIDS -- Pretty adorable animal erasers, designed impeccable. Great for 3 4 5 6 7 8 years old boys & girls, as Birthday gifts, Christmas gifts, Easter gift, Valentines gifts, Carnival gifts, Halloween gifts, back to school supplies gifts! Put cute erasers into goodie bags, welcome upcoming festival. You won't believe how much your little love it!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ARSCNIEK Vivid Mini Animal Food Erasers (Random Color). Ideal Desk Pets, Birthday Gifts for 3 4 5 6 7 8 Years Old Boys & Girls! Great Classroom Rewards & Prizes Excellent incentives for kids, perfect as classroom prizes for students, let naughty children to be the more obedient, well finish assignments by getting cute erasers, develop good behavior. As desk pets, novelty toys, home collection, learning tool, preschool props & teaching aids. A great ideal for home/ Desk/ kitchen decoration or children party, pinata stuffers.

Large Assortments of Erasers Let your child to classify 3D puzzle erasers, help them understand the composition of the Land, Ocean and Space. Also promote hand-eye coordination, recognize all kinds of Animals, Food, Transportation and more, inspire kid's imagination & creativity.

Take Apart Erasers 3D mini erasers can be taken apart and reassembled. Each eraser is a tiny puzzle. Super Fun! Exercise kids' logical thinking ability, hand-eye coordination, fine motor skill. Erase Pencil Mark Cleanly Funny food animal erasers, cleanly remove pencil mark without residue. Provide your kids with an entertaining way to put mistakes away, improve learning interest! School Supplies for Kids A huge number of awesome pencil erasers, meeting calculation needs of preschoolers. Good manipulative for little hands to sort, count, and play with.

Kawaii Mini Pencil Erasers for Boys Girls, Can be Used for Different Occasions Not only cute school supplies, but also fantastic toys for kids boys girls toddlers.Perfect for Valentines exchange gifts, holiday gifts, desk pets, Thanksgiving gift, trick-or-treaters, treasure chest, advent calendars, Easter egg fillers and DIY activities.

WARM-TIPS: 1.Not suitable for children under 3 years old. 2.CHOKING HAZARD - Small parts, Please do not put in your mouth! 3. Most erasers are fixed style and random colors. Refer to the picture above for the style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price, great product.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these for Operation Christmas Child Shoeboxes as a filler in the pencil packs.They are larger than I expected most of them were 1”-2” in size, there were 70 different characters in a variety of categories. ( food, animals, water creatures, people, dinosaurs, sports equipment, cars, rockets, tractors, boats, construction vehicles)They are also small 2 or 3 piece mini puzzles.They would be great for school & Church group rewards. I would highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 3rd graders work to earn these erasers, and they are really great looking and creative little puzzles, thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are the cutest things ever! Excellent quality, they all come apart into 2-3 pieces to play with like a puzzle, and the various shapes/characters are awesome. I bought 70 to give away in goody bags for my kids classmates, there were going to be a few extra so I let my kids pick out which ones they wanted, and let me tell you it was a hard decision making process! They are all so cute. I might even buy another box just for us now 😉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: great for piñatas or party favors!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my classroom prize box! I was worried this would be a gimmick and the “70” pieces would refer to, say, the three pieces each that make up each animal, but I received literally 70 erasers. There are animals, vehicles, and food mostly. They do get dirty and fall apart if not taken care of, but that’s to be expected. My students like them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product for my 5th grade students as a reward. The students love them and even trade with one another. This has been a huge motivator within my classroom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son's Kindergarten teacher said these erasers were the perfect addition to her school treasure box. Great size and price for the amount you get. They are more novelty than an every day eraser but the kids love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My students love getting these cute erasers as prizes in the treasure chest I have. Great value!
